name: Dungeon Collector - vimlark jam
description:
Game made for the Vimlark Game Jam. 

Restriction : Collectables 

Theme : There and Back ! 

Explore the always changing dungeon and bring back the Tresors to the Entrance.

There's One  enemy type  and 5 Tresors to collect in this Jam Version :)
Your progress will be automatically saved.
